name: Blast Down (itch)
description:
In a top-secret lab, brave pilots volunteer to test the world's first "Jettison Pack." There's some kind of design flaw with this model, but we haven't worked out what it is...

Oh, those robots with the blades and guns? Don't worry about them. Completely unrelated science going on over there.

A full-page, touch-and-tilt version of this game for mobile devices is hosted here.
